name: EZO - 2D Endless Runner Game
description: EZO - Simple 2D Endless Runner Game made by myself). LefrArrow(Or keyword A) and RightArrow(Or keyword D) to move the player Left and Right. UpArrow or Space to jump. Try to avoid Rockets falling from the sky and do not let the Bomb Timer run out. Have fun guys!!! I hope you will like this Game). It is my second project. Thank you everyone.
